tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    winning_team VARCHAR(255),
    losing_team VARCHAR(255),
    winning_score INT,
    losing_score INT,
    game_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    winning_team_id INT,
    losing_team_id INT,
    winning_team_score INT,
    losing_team_score INT,
    game_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    winning_team_id UUID NOT NULL,
    losing_team_id UUID NOT NULL,
    score INT NOT NULL,
    game_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    winning_team_id INT NOT NULL,
    losing_team_id INT NOT NULL,
    score INT NOT NULL,
    game_duration TIME NOT NULL
);
